item.title: use ChatGPT on your own pdfs
item.description:
AI Breakfast on Twitter

‚ÄúUse ChatGPT on your own files This is going to be big: https://t.co/Nh3SZIUDsM lets you upload a .pdf up to 60 pages long and allows you to ask questions about it in plain English ‚Üì‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/aibreakfast/status/1621668590738079744?s=61&t=vXyBDrlttubQyAX_Iy-LtQ

source: Sunday assorted links

item.title: how to build LLM apps that are more factual
item.description:
Raza Habib on Twitter

‚ÄúThe ReAct Paper is next-level prompt engineering. If you understand how it works then you can start building LLM apps that are way more factual than chatGPT and can use external APIs and tools. Check-out the example at the end. To understand ReAct, let‚Äôs think step-by-step:‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/razrazcle/status/1622033232232611841?s=46&t=bMJn10sbiD3BBoAevAEC_g

source: Sunday assorted links

item.description:
Thomas Sorheim on Twitter

‚ÄúMajor leak!! üö® Microsoft integrates ChatGPT in Bing. This looks crazy! See all the SCREENSHOTS in this thread üßµüëá #chatgpt #ai #bing #microsoft #leak‚Äù

item.title: Sam says

Sam Altman on Twitter

‚Äúeliezer has IMO done more to accelerate AGI than anyone else. certainly he got many of us interested in AGI, helped deepmind get funded at a time when AGI was extremely outside the overton window, was critical in the decision to start openai, etc.‚Äù

item.title: Google announces Dreamix
item.description:
bleedingedge.ai on Twitter

‚ÄúGoogle announces Dreamix: a model that generates videos when given: - video + prompt (Video editing) - input images + prompt (Subject Driven Generation) - input image + prompt (Image-toVideo‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/bleedingedgeai/status/1621594463218040832?s=46&t=1C5xehPOXu09ZtAPRcXP_Q

item.title: Poe is now out
item.description:
Riley Goodside on Twitter

‚ÄúPoe chat is out on iOS, and includes *both* OpenAI and Anthropic models! If you want to talk to Claude (Anthropic‚Äôs competitor to ChatGPT) install Poe and use the ‚ÄúHeron‚Äù bot ‚Äî if it‚Äôs not Claude, it‚Äôs something very similar.‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/goodside/status/1621614391132143617

item.description:

item.title: On the military potential of balloons
item.description:
William ‚ÄúBalloon Guy‚Äù Kim on Twitter

‚ÄúI‚Äôm not sure people realize how big of a deal this is. High-altitude balloons might not be as sexy as autonomous weapons or hypersonics but I think they have the potential to be just as revolutionary for warfare, if not more so. üßµ 1/10‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/TheKimulation/status/1544527308282896385
